insert into five_ed_product (business_key, project_id, project_name, contract_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, dept_id, dept_name, form_no, product_date, user_name, user_tel, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end ) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT} )
mapper.update: update five_ed_product set business_key = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_no = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stage_name = #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, step_id = #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, step_name = #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_no = #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_date = #{productDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_tel = #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_process_end = #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, contract_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, dept_id, dept_name, form_no, product_date, user_name, user_tel, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end from five_ed_product where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, contract_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, dept_id, dept_name, form_no, product_date, user_name, user_tel, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end from five_ed_product
